title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・敗北後と次の夢

text_block_list.text: She conceded victory to Rice Shower in the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)'. While praising her, she's determined to win next time.
The next target race is the 'Takarazuka Kinen'. The next morning, when I went out for self-training, I saw Mejiro McQueen running hard.
Matikanetannhauser is impressed by the stoic figure running hard, aiming to channel the frustration from the 'Emperor's Award (Spring)' into the 'Takarazuka Kinen'.
Two months later, the G1 Medium Distance 'Takarazuka Kinen'. To seize victory, one must train with their might!
